entries.title: K&G Loyalty Platform
entries.description: Founded in 1959, Kum & Go redefines convenience with customer-centric offerings.
entries.label: Read More

entries.title: Problem
entries.body: Kum & Go aimed to redefine convenience for their customers by upgrading their digital experience. They sought to enhance their mobile app to include better search and merchandising, a new loyalty program, and support for modern shopping preferences. Additionally, the new app needed to be adaptable for future updates and improvements without causing any service disruptions.

entries.title: Solution
entries.body: Orium worked with Kum & Go to develop a React Native framework, leveraging Orium’s React Native Accelerator for a faster, more efficient development process. Contentful’s composable content platform was implemented for easy content management, and Typesense was used for search and product indexing. Paytronix was chosen to manage the loyalty program, providing comprehensive loyalty, promotions, and ordering capabilities. Integration with P97 enhanced Mobile Fuel Pay, allowing for prepaying gas and redeeming points at the pump.

entries.title: Outcome
entries.body:
The revamped Kum & Go mobile app launched with an upgraded rewards program and an enhanced ecommerce experience. Key features included a personalized interface, home location selection, and customer history-based recommendations. The Mobile Fuel Pay feature was also improved, allowing customers to prepay for gas in selected increments.

Kum & Go plans to continue enhancing the mobile app and redesigning the web experience to match the new mobile app features.

entries.title: OnLogic Composable Commerce Platform
entries.description: Empowering technical users with precision, flexibility, and control for configuring industrial PC systems.
entries.label: Read More

keypoints.title: Empower Technical Users
keypoints.body: Designed an interface for IT professionals and developers, providing advanced customization options with usability in mind.

keypoints.title: Facilitate Developer Implementation
keypoints.body: Created UI workflows developers could implement and extend, aligning with composable architecture principles.

keypoints.title: Support High Customizability
keypoints.body: Enabled configuration and purchase of highly customizable products with seamless integration of pricing, tax rules, and global payment systems.

keypoints.title: Provide Transparency and Control
keypoints.body: Delivered detailed product configuration workflows with real-time feedback and clear user-facing data.

entries.title: Problem
entries.body: OnLogic needed a platform tailored to technical users, including IT professionals, to handle the complexities of configuring customizable products. The existing legacy platform couldn’t provide the precision, transparency, or scalability required to meet the needs of a global audience.

images.caption: Legacy platform lacked configurability and scalability.

entries.title: Solution
entries.body: Migrated to a composable commerce architecture using commercetools, enabling OnLogic to scale and meet modern demands. Developed configurable PDPs with real-time price calculations, validation checks, and modular designs. Integrated content management (Contentful), search (Algolia), and custom payment/tax systems to meet global requirements.

images.caption: Composable architecture tailored for technical users.

entries.title: Outcome
entries.body: The platform empowered OnLogic’s technical users with advanced customization options, seamless workflows, and real-time validation. Developers benefited from detailed design handoffs and modular implementation strategies. The scalable platform allows OnLogic to evolve its offerings to meet future needs.
